t: Amazon.com : Kitikiti Medicated Treatment Conditioner I, 8 Oz : Health & Household
s: Kitikiti is very expensive so I was definitely weary of this purchase. I have new locs and have been dealing with scalp eczema for most of my life. My loctician suggested this to me and I have no complaints. I use it once every 2 weeks or so along with the shampoo and the ointment.
